SpeechNode.text: Hi there! Come to see the EarthStrom?
SpeechNode.name: Rulo1

SpeechNode.text: Well, be careful because that God Weapon won't let just anyone pass through. You must be a true Hero and overcome the EarthStrom.
SpeechNode.name: Rulo2

SpeechNode.text: Yeah, I know how you think it's supposed to be announciated. We call it STROM instead of storm because that used to be the name of a mighty warrior.
SpeechNode.name: RuloA

SpeechNode.text: Strom conquered all, but his quest for power never splintered. He seeked a great weapon of the Gods and ended up losing his way through the SandStorm. He was defeated and now all townsfolk refer to the SandStorm as 'The Strom.'
SpeechNode.name: RuloB
